description: A cienaCesTacacsClientConnectionFailed notification is sent if the
TACACS client is unable to contact the TACACS server.

event.Summary: Unable to connect to TACACS server at $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-TACACS-CLIENT-MIB::cienaCesTacacsClientConnectionFailed CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 4 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-TACACS-CLIENT-MIB::cienaCesTacacsClientServerResolvedInetAddrType i 1 CIENA-CES-TACACS-CLIENT-MIB::cienaCesTacacsClientServerResolvedInetAddr s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Specifies the resolved IP address type. Used in conjunction with
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TACACS-CLIENT-MIB::cienaCesTacacsClientServerResolvedInetAddrType

description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesTacacsClientServerAddr is set to host name.
If cienaCesTacacsClientServerAddr is set to IP address then cienaCesTacacsClientServerResolvedInetAddress
contains the same information as cienaCesTacacsClientServerAddr. This OID is used in
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TACACS-CLIENT-MIB::cienaCesTacacsClientServerResolvedInetAddr
